node.title: Parrotlet Crochet Keychain
node.description: Meet the cutest addition to your keys or bags – the Parrotlet Crochet Keychain! This mini handmade bird, standing about 3 inches tall, is customizable with your chosen name and colors. It even comes with an adorable charm. Perfect for adding a splash of fun and personality to your everyday items, or as a thoughtful gift for friends and family. Whether it's for a birthday, holiday, or just because, this keychain is a delightful way to show someone you care.
